about_the_game:
Need a mountaintop temple with an icy edge? Explore an icicle-filled, shiver-inducing dungeon with the Legendary Palace ~ Yeti tileset!

The Legendary Palace ~ Yeti Tileset Includes:


Ground Tiles:

Water tiles (icy blue and purple)
Plain floor in gray, ice blue and snow colors
Two tile types (plain and fancy) in gray, ice blue and snow
Snow texture in gray, ice blue and snow
Various spike traps, holes and debris tiles

Walls:

Wall tiles to match floor tiles.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
ice jewel accents
treasure chest (with animated version)
push block (stump)
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest
Animated glowing ice jewels
